ygData.subject: Re: New warrior changes
ygData.msgSnippet: I read on anothjer mailing list that the crit hit system wasn t THAT great but that it was an improvement. In levels 1-5 he critically hit somewhere in the
ygData.messageBody:
I read on anothjer mailing list that the crit hit system wasn't THAT great but that it was an improvement. In levels 1-5 he critically hit somewhere in the range of 5-7 times. I am also sure the added HPs will help too.

Am I just not recieving emails anymore or has the traffic on here REALLY slowed down a lot? Also whats the going prices on PGT's now and runed falchions? I love my combine scimitars altho now I am test driving a tentacle whip at the Oasis.

Akiro
15th Rank
Barbarian Warrior
The Rathe

>>> "Tom Swift" <tswift@...> 07/13/99 10:00AM >>>
Has anyone tried the warrior changes on the test server?
As I understand it there is a critical hit system in place now.
